name: OMI Family Center - Counseling and Mental Health Support
description: OMI’s staff is available to help you Monday to Friday 8:30am to 5:00pm. If you are an existing patient, please call (415) 452-2200 and leave a message or call your therapist directly. If you are a new patient and need an urgent, in-person appointment, please call (415) 452-2200, leave a message and OMI will return your call to arrange services. The OMI Family Center provides a full range of outpatient services to individuals including group counseling, assessment, psychiatric evaluation, and inv
